definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: But it will be a goal for Cagliari.
sentences.chinese: 但这是一个为了卡利亚里队的进球。

sentences.english: No one thought that Cagliari could have been saved seven days before the end.
sentences.chinese: 结束前七天没有人认为卡利亚里将是死里逃生的那个。

sentences.english: Roma management are discussing a move for Cagliari star David Suazo.
sentences.chinese: 罗马的管理层增在讨论要引进卡利亚里的球星苏亚佐。

sentences.english: The game against Cagliari is really important.
sentences.chinese: 和卡利亚里的比赛十分重要。

sentences.english: Cagliari has changed coach and we don't know the identity of this team very well.
sentences.chinese: 卡利亚里换了主教练，我们不知道如何识别这支球队。

sentences.english: However, we must be careful because Cagliari are not an easy team.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我们必须小心，卡利亚里不好对付。

sentences.english: The three points from Cagliari will be very important for us.
sentences.chinese: 从卡利亚里取得三分对我们来说将会是非常的重要。

sentences.english: The favourite is Chimenti of Cagliari who would make a return to the Old Lady.
sentences.chinese: 最有可能的是卡利亚里的奇门蒂返回“老妇人”。

sentences.english: He will be visiting four cities including Cagliari in Sardinia.
sentences.chinese: 他将会参观四个城市，包括撒丁岛的卡利亚里。

sentences.english: There are two big games coming up, against Cagliari and then Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 和卡利亚里的比赛十分重要。

definition: Napoli, capital of Campania region of Italy/Naples
FC Internazionale Milano (football club)/abbr. for 國際米蘭足球俱樂部|国际米兰足球俱乐部[Guo2 ji4 Mi3 lan2 Zu2 qiu2 Ju4 le4 bu4]
La Coruña or A Coruña (city in Galicia, Spain)

pinyin: Men2 xing1 ge2 la1 de2 ba1 he4

definition: Málaga, Spain/Malaga city in Iranian East Azerbaijan
Serie A, the top division of the Italian football league system

pinyin: La1 si1 pa4 er3 ma3 si1
